snippet: BP Plc rejoined bidders for exploration and production leases in the Gulf of Mexico on Wednesday and won 24 tracts after the U.S. government lifted a 16-month ban barring the company from new federal contracts....

headline.print_headline: BP Bids in Gulf of Mexico Lease Sale After U.S. Lifts Ban
headline.main: BP Bids in Gulf of Mexico Lease Sale After U.S. Lifts Ban

lead_paragraph: BP Plc rejoined bidders for exploration and production leases in the Gulf of Mexico on Wednesday and won 24 tracts after the U.S. government lifted a 16-month ban barring the company from new federal contracts.
